attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I ask the Goverment for action to reintroduce Corporal punishment in schools, as there is no respect these days !

Goverment to take action on murder, with increased Gun crime, and re-introduce Capital Punishment!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
